Job Description: Job Brief    We are looking for a Senior Software Developer having 3 years of experience to produce and implement functional software solutions. You will work with team to define software requirements and take the lead on projects.   In this role, you should be able to work independently with little supervision. You should have excellent organization and problem-solving skills.     Skills Required:     ASP.NET, C#, MVC   XML, Web API, IIS    JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, SignalR, HTML, CSS   Angular JS, Angular   SQL, ETL, BI, SSRS, SSAS and SSIS    Contact Center technology experience preferred    Good communication skills     Other Behavioral / Attitude Aspects:     Dynamic, self-motivated and self-driven   Team Player   Having a sense of ownership.   Be willing to travel periodically, both Domestic and International     Qualifications / Proficiency   B.Tech, B E or MCA
